subject: DEAR DARRIN
body:
DEAR DARRIN,



WE  WRITE TO  INFORM YOU THAT WE RECEIVED  YOUR  PARCEL FROM MR. HILBASIL
ALVIS FOR ONWARD DELIVERY TO  YOUR  ADDRESS. WE HAVE ALSO RECEIVED YOUR
DELIVERY ADDRESS. PLEASE BE INFORMED THAT OUR COMPANY DELIVERY POLICY FOR
SHIPMENT WEIGHING BELOW 10KG IS

PAY BEFORE POSTING. YOU ARE EXPECTED TO PAY A DELIVERY FEES OF 320 DOLLAR.
AS SOON AS WE RECEIVED THE 320 DOLLAR DELIVERY FEE, WE WILL POST THE PARCEL
TO YOUR ADDRESS IMMEDIATELY.


THEN WE WILL ISSUE YOU PAYMENT INVOICE AND THE PARCEL TRACKING NUMBER. THE
PARCEL WILL ARRIVE AT YOUR ADDRESS WITHIN 48 WORKING HOURS.


SEND THE 320 DOLLAR THROUGH MONEYGRAM OR RIA WITH THE NAME OF OUR
ACCOUNTANT AS FOLLOWS.



RECEIVERS NAME:........NANCY JOHN
CITY...................LOME
COUNTRY: .......TOGO
AMOUNT: ..........$320 ONLY
QUESTION: ........COLOUR
ANSWER: ...........BLUE.


WE ARE WAITING FOR YOUR PROMPT RESPONSE TO ENABLE US SERVE YOU BETTER.


YOURS IN SERVICE,

MR. NANCY JOHN

subject: Re: DEAR DARRIN
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details about the parcel that was received from Mr. Hilbasil Alvis? I would like to know what it contains and any other relevant information.

Best wishes,
Darrin

subject: Re: DEAR DARRIN
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate the update on the parcel delivery process. Could you please provide more details about the parcel itself? What is being sent to me and from whom?

Best wishes,
Darrin

subject: Re: DEAR DARRIN
body:
Attention: Beneficiary,

                YOUR ATM VISA CARD IS READY


I have been waiting for you to contact me regarding your winning amount of
$US1,500, 000.00 (Two Million United State Dollars) loaded on your ATM Visa
Card which we discussed. We are duly interred, therefore you can make
withdrawals in any location of ATM Machine Center Cashpoint of your choice
in any part of the world and the maximum you can withdraw a day is $10,000
US Dollar.


I did not hear from you since then I went and deposited the package ATM
CARD with Courier Company, Johannesburg South Africa as I travelled out of
the country for a short Course and I will not come back till end of 3rd
quarter of the year 2024. What you have to do now is to contact the Courier
Company as soon as possible to know when they will deliver your package to
you because of the expiring date.

For your information, I have paid for the Clearance Certificate Fee neither
of the ATM CARD showing that it is not a drug Money nor to sponsor
Terrorist attack in your Country. The only money you will pay to the
Courier Company to deliver your ATM CARD directly to your Postal Address in
your country is ($US320) only being the Security Keeping Fees of the
Courier Company

.
Again, Don't be deceived by anybody to pay any other money except $US320
United States. I would have paid that but they said no, because they don't
know when you will contact them and in case of demurrage. You have to
contact the Diplomatic Courier Company manager for the delivery of your ATM
CARD package with this information below immediately.

HERE IS THE COURIER COMPANY INFORMATION:
COURIER NAME: DIPLOMATIC  COURIER  SERVICES
CONTACT PERSON: MR .TONY ADAMS
POSITION: DIRECTOR DELIVERY DEPARTMENT.
E-MAIL: diplomaticourierservices1@gmail.com
Please make sure that you reconfirm the following details below to them:

1. Full Name
2. Country of Origin
3. Receiving Address
4. Direct Telephone Number
5. Occupation
6. Age
7. Security Code

Again to avoid any mistake on the Delivery just ask them to give you the
tracking numbers to enable you track your package over there and know when
it will get to your address. Let me repeat again, try to contact them as
soon as you receive this message to avoid any further delay and remember
you are to pay them their Security Keeping Fee of $US320 only for their
immediate action.
As a matter of facts, make sure as the rightful beneficiary of the ATM CARD
package of $US1,500, 000.00 (Two Million United State Dollars) ) you must
contact them by indicating the Code (5873428) so that they can find it in
the system and pick it up immediately as they have it in their record.

Yours Sincerely
MR .TONY ADAMS
Acting Manager of VISA CARD PAYMENT CENTER, South Africa.
(VISA CARD DEPARTMENT) First National Bank Limited, South Africa (F.N.B.)

subject: Re: DEAR DARRIN
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I'm interested in learning more about how I can claim the ATM Visa Card with the winning amount. Could you provide me with more details on how to contact the Courier Company and proceed with receiving the package?

Best wishes,
Darrin
